about_the_game:
Hi everyone,

I'm delighted to have you play my game.

What we have in-game so far

  • Game type: Adult Visual Novel

  • Animations: 60+ animations with sexual sound effects featuring a lot of girls!

  • Background Music: Lighthearted music sets the tone.

  • Story Branches: Two main branches alter the story plots with completely different animations.

  • Current Season: This is Season 0 (the pilot season) of City Lights Love Bites!

  • Current Progress: The game is featuring about 1 ~ 2 hours of gameplay so far. Two more episodes are in development, which are expected to add an additional 2 hours of gameplay.

  • Purpose of the pilot season: You will see a lot of sex scenes, yes, and all girls want MC, yes. All motivations will be explained by the end of the pilot season, offering a deeper understanding of the story's direction.

What I will do for this game down the road

  • Planned Seasons: The game is planned to have 11 seasons (pilot + 10 more seasons). Each season can be played individually. You'll see! Also, I'm planning to make season 1 a small sandbox game. In future, of course I'd love to try Unreal Engine 5!

  • My update schedule is usually every 3 weeks. Going to end this season by the end of Feb 2025

  • Two Special Contents featuring the most popular characters

  • Now I'm using two 4090 graphics card to do the work. Dumping my 2060!

content_descriptors.notes:
[h2]Mature Content Overview[/h2]

[h2]This game contains the following mature themes and content that players should be aware of:[/h2]
[list]
[*]Sexual Content: The game includes graphic depictions of sexual acts. These scenes are integral to the storyline and are portrayed in a realistic and consensual manner.
[*]Alcohol Use: Characters in the game may consume alcohol in a social context, but there is no depiction of drug or alcohol abuse.
[*]Violence: The game includes the use of swords for thematic purposes, but there is no extreme violence depicted.
[*]Dubious Consent: There may be sexual acts with ambiguous or unclear consent.
[/list]

[h2]Content NOT Present in This Game:[/h2]
[list]
[*]Sexual Assault/Non-Consensual Sex: The game does not contain any scenes or references to sexual assault or non-consensual sexual activities.
[*]Drug/Alcohol Abuse: There are no depictions of drug abuse or excessive alcohol consumption.
[*]Self-Harm: The game does not include any content related to self-harm or suicidal behavior.
[*]Fetish Content (e.g., BDSM): There is no fetish content, such as BDSM, depicted in the game.
[*]Incest: The game does not feature any incestuous relationships or themes.
[*]Extreme violence
[/list]

This game is designed for mature audiences only. If you are sensitive to any of the above themes, are looking for a lighthearted gaming experience, or are not at the legal age in your country to play this game, this game may not be suitable for you.

detailed_description:
Current Main Walkthrough


You can also play Jiya Special after the main walkthrough~


About the Game

Hi everyone,

I'm delighted to have you play my game.

What we have in-game so far

  • Game type: Adult Visual Novel

  • Animations: 60+ animations with sexual sound effects featuring a lot of girls!

  • Background Music: Lighthearted music sets the tone.

  • Story Branches: Two main branches alter the story plots with completely different animations.

  • Current Season: This is Season 0 (the pilot season) of City Lights Love Bites!

  • Current Progress: The game is featuring about 1 ~ 2 hours of gameplay so far. Two more episodes are in development, which are expected to add an additional 2 hours of gameplay.

  • Purpose of the pilot season: You will see a lot of sex scenes, yes, and all girls want MC, yes. All motivations will be explained by the end of the pilot season, offering a deeper understanding of the story's direction.

What I will do for this game down the road

  • Planned Seasons: The game is planned to have 11 seasons (pilot + 10 more seasons). Each season can be played individually. You'll see! Also, I'm planning to make season 1 a small sandbox game. In future, of course I'd love to try Unreal Engine 5!

  • My update schedule is usually every 3 weeks. Going to end this season by the end of Feb 2025

  • Two Special Contents featuring the most popular characters

  • Now I'm using two 4090 graphics card to do the work. Dumping my 2060!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.10+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: MC gets a fresh start after quitting his job and moving to the city of RoshVale. In RoshVale, he will encounter six main female characters. Will he find his perfect match under the city lights, or will he be a player driven by lust? The choice is yours! The story is super simple, or is it?
